messages.content: Try to make the summary anywhere between 200-1000 words

mapper.prompt:
Generate an image for this blog post:
{{2.choices[].message.content}}.

Make sure that the image is clear, captures the readers attention, and is realistic. Please do not include words, numbers or any digits in the image

messages.content:
Create a title for this article:
{{2.choices[].message.content}}
The title should be catchy, and hook the reader into wanting to click through to read the rest of the article. Make sure it's under 50 characters.

The output needs to be html. I want you to take the image URL here and create a picture for this article too:
{{19.data[].url}}

Make sure not to include any other information or text outside of the post, and do not include any custom variables such as [Your Name], that are incomplete. Make sure everything is polished and able to be published

Make sure not to include any other information or text outside of the post, and do not include any custom variables such as [Your Name], that are incomplete. Make sure everything is polished and able to be published

You are a social media expert and are creating an instagram post. The post should be engaging and hook the reader to want to engage through liking, commenting and sharing the post. 
Make sure to use any relevant hashtags to increase exposure at the end of the post. For example, #hashtag_1, hashtag_2.
Also make sure to use a tasteful amount of emojis where applicable (do not overdo this).

Here is a brief summary of the article you'll need to turn into a twitter post: 
{{2.choices[].message.content}}

Make sure the output is plain text. No HTML, markdown, or anything else. Make sure not to include any other information or text outside of the post, and do not include any custom variables such as [Your Name], that are incomplete. Make sure everything is polished and able to be published

Make sure the output is plain text. No HTML, markdown, or anything else. Make sure not to include any other information or text outside of the post, and do not include any custom variables such as [Your Name], that are incomplete. Make sure everything is polished and able to be published
